label: 里内裏
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [From the Heian period] emperors [lived] permanently in sato dairi situated elsewhere in the city, and [visited] the Palace only for such extraordinary events as Accession Audiences (p. 853).
